attributes.action: Encourage the NHS to take measures to prevent post abortion stress syndrome
attributes.additional_details:
Post abortion stress syndrome (PASS) isn’t widely acknowledged among medical professionals.  Many women are told they will probably feel sad for a few days and are unprepared for the overwhelming guilt and sadness they feel, sometimes for the rest of their lives.

All clinics should ensure women are offered one to one counselling before an abortion to ensure this is the right choice for them and that they are made aware of the potential for post abortion stress syndrome.

Please log onto http://postabortionstress.webs.com for more information on PASS.
